text: Howard Lindsay Goodall (; born 26 May 1958) is an English composer who has worked on musicals, choral music and music for television. He was the composer of the music for Mr. Bean. ==Honours== In January 2011, Goodall was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in the 2011 New Year Honours for services to music education. Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:English composers
title: Howard Goodall
